The District Industries Centre in association with the Tiruchi District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association will organise a special consultative meet for entrepreneurs and raising awareness on entrepreneurship at the Union Office at Manapparai on Saturday. The meeting would seek to raise awareness on Urban Youth Employment Guarantee Programme and the subsidy available under the scheme for starting new ventures. The meeting will be held at 11 a.m. Interested candidates can participate in the meeting, S. Punniyamurthy, Secretary, TIDITSSIA, said in a release.

Pensioners to

submit Aadhaar

All pensioners drawing pension from the District Treasury and sub treasuries have been advised to submit copies of their Aadhaar cards immediately at the respective treasuries. The pensioners are also required to submit their Income Tax computation forms at the treasuries concerned along with their PAN card copies before February 10, an official release said. Pensioners can access details about their pension from the web link: 218.248.44.30/ecsstatus

Aadhaar campaign

A door-to-door exercise to link the Aadhaar numbers of residents with the National Population Registry is under way in the district, Collector K.S. Palanisamy said in a release. Field workers will visit households and residents of the district were required to provide their Aadhaar numbers of all family members. Those who have not got their Aadhaar cards yet are required to provide the EID number provided in the acknowledgements slips issued during the recording of biometric details. The exercise will be completed by February 5. Those who have not registered their bio metric details for getting the Aadhaar cards can do so immediately by approaching the taluk, municipal, or corporation offices concerned, Mr. Palanisamy said.
title: Special meet for entrepreneurs
